content: Hi, I was just wondering, what is the "entry bar" for getting permissions for running rust-timer on PRs? :D I want to further experiment with BOLT and PGO on CI, which takes a lot of perf. attempts and I feel bad asking/spamming others for it constantly. Although for new PRs it probably won't help by itself, since I won't have try permissions, but I already have it for my BOLT PR, so I could use it as a CI perf testbed of sorts.

It is generally similar to try permissions - both have similar risks involved. We don't have a great strategy for granting these to 'new' contributors just yet; but in general, you shouldn't feel bad about poking for a perf run on an as-needed basis (there's a standing thread in #t-compiler/help > perf run I believe).
I see :) Ok, that's good enough for me.
Jakub Beránek has marked this topic as resolved.
